short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,de,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Play Wheelie Bike offline game. It is a fun game that is as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, Try it now!
short.da: Spil Wheelie Bike offline Game. Det er et sjovt spil, der er som en Chrome -udvidelse - kan også spille uden internet, prøv det nu!
short.el: Παίξτε Wheelie Bike Offline Game. Είναι ένα διασκεδαστικό παιχνίδι που είναι ως επέκταση Chrome - μπορεί επίσης να παίξει χωρίς…
short.es: Juega el juego de bicicleta de ruedas sin conexión. Es un juego divertido que es como una extensión de Chrome: también puede jugar…
short.et: Mängige Wheelie Bike'i võrguühenduseta mängu. See on lõbus mäng, mis on Chrome'i laiend - saab ka ilma Internetita mängida,…
short.ja: ウィリーバイクオフラインゲームをプレイします。それはクロム拡張機能としての楽しいゲームです - また、インターネットなしで再生できます、今すぐ試してください！
short.ko: 휠리 자전거 오프라인 게임을 플레이하십시오. 크롬 확장자 인 재미있는 게임입니다. 인터넷없이 플레이 할 수 있습니다. 지금 시도하십시오!
short.nl: Speel Wheelie Bike Offline Game. Het is een leuk spel dat is als een Chrome -extensie - kan ook zonder internet spelen, probeer het…
short.tr: Çevrimdışı oyun oynayın. Krom uzantısı gibi eğlenceli bir oyun - ayrıca internet olmadan oynayabilir, şimdi deneyin!
short.vi: Chơi trò chơi ngoại tuyến xe đạp Wheelie. Đây là một trò chơi thú vị là một phần mở rộng chrome - cũng có thể chơi mà không cần…
short.zh_CN: 玩车轮自行车离线游戏。这是一款有趣的游戏，它是镀铬扩展 - 也可以在没有互联网的情况下玩游戏，请立即尝试！
short.zh_TW: 玩車輪自行車離線遊戲。這是一款有趣的遊戲，它是鍍鉻擴展 - 也可以在沒有互聯網的情況下玩遊戲，請立即嘗試！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Master The Art Of Balance In Wheelie Bike: A Thrilling Cycling Adventure!

Introduction
Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping cycling adventure in Wheelie Bike! This exciting game puts your balance and control skills to the test as you perform wheelies and stunts on your bike. Prepare yourself for a thrilling and challenging ride!

Gameplay
Wheelie Bike offers a simple yet addictive gameplay experience that will keep you engaged for hours. Here's how to play:

Bike Balance: Your main objective in Wheelie Bike is to maintain balance while riding on one wheel (performing a wheelie) for as long as possible. Use the arrow keys or on-screen controls to control the bike's speed and balance.

Wheelie Control: Press and hold the up arrow key or on-screen control to lift the front wheel of the bike off the ground. This initiates the wheelie. Release the key to lower the front wheel back down. Finding the right balance is crucial to keep the wheelie going.
Obstacles and Challenges: As you progress through the game, you'll encounter various obstacles and challenges on your path. These may include ramps, jumps, and gaps that require precise timing and control to overcome. Navigate through the course, perform stunts, and avoid crashing.
